name: Provenzano: The Lethal Dose
description:
The year is 3A0083 and there is skullduggery afoot at Scentia Tower. The Director of Finance has been found murdered in his office and the prestigious reputation of the Eschem Pharmaceutical Corporation is at stake. The leads are few and there are a number of things that just don't quite add up. Enter private investigator Michael Provenzano. Will he, with the aid of plucky personal assistant Penny Flores, be able to crack the case and bring some semblance of normality back to the high rise?

Available both for MacOS and Windows, Provenzano: The Lethal Dose is a retro gaming title that harkens back to the classic SNES era of top down adventure games. It combines the visual style of games such as The Legend of Zelda: A Link To The Past and Secret of Mana with the immersive story telling of titles such as Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers and Indiana Jones & The Fate Of Atlantis.

This game is in active development and is completely free to download! Follow my social media for updates on the project and the progress of part two.

In addition, the full original soundtrack is available now for streaming and purchase on most mainstream platforms (including Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon Music, Soundcloud and Tiktok). Chock full of catchy tunes and memorable licks, this ode to 90s gaming will transport you back to a time when Sonic and Mario were the kings of console gaming. Like Michael Provenzano, you too can experience a journey through Scentia Tower. Brush shoulders with its many colourful employees and come face to face with it's robotic inhabitants via the classic sounds of the 16-bit era.
